info.title: OpenAPI Plant Store
info.description: A sample API that uses a plant store as an example to demonstrate features in the OpenAPI specification

get.description:
Get comprehensive profile data, including experience, education history, and current company details.
 1 credit per call.
 Using each extra option will cost another 0.5 credits.

parameters.name: include_skills
parameters.description: Include skills in the response. Possible values: true, false. Default value: false. Enabling this option will cost an additional 0.5 credits.

parameters.name: include_certifications
parameters.description: Include certifications in the response. Possible values: true, false. Default value: false. Enabling this option will cost an additional 0.5 credits.

parameters.name: include_publications
parameters.description: Include publications in the response. Possible values: true, false. Default value: false. Enabling this option will cost an additional 0.5 credits.

parameters.name: include_honors
parameters.description: Include honors in the response. Possible values: true, false. Default value: false. Enabling this option will cost an additional 0.5 credits.

parameters.name: include_volunteers
parameters.description: Include volunteers in the response. Possible values: true, false. Default value: false. Enabling this option will cost an additional 0.5 credits.

parameters.name: include_projects
parameters.description: Include projects in the response. Possible values: true, false. Default value: false. Enabling this option will cost an additional 0.5 credits.

parameters.name: include_patents
parameters.description: Include patents in the response. Possible values: true, false. Default value: false. Enabling this option will cost an additional 0.5 credits.

parameters.name: include_courses
parameters.description: Include courses in the response. Possible values: true, false. Default value: false. Enabling this option will cost an additional 0.5 credits.

parameters.name: include_organizations
parameters.description: Include organizations in the response. Possible values: true, false. Default value: false. Enabling this option will cost an additional 0.5 credits.

parameters.name: include_profile_status
parameters.description: Include profile status in the response. Possible values: true, false. Default value: false. Enabling this option will cost an additional 0.5 credits.

parameters.name: include_company_public_url
parameters.description: Possible values: true, false. Default value: false. This option is free of charge.

delete.description: Deletes a single plant based on the ID supplied
